Not Smoking
                
Those who smoke should quit. A health care provider can help people find ways to quit smoking. Studies show that people who get help have a better chance of quitting.
                
For more information about how to reverse insulin resistance and prediabetes with diet and increased physical activity, see the following National Diabetes Education P
